data.description:
Great burst damage, speed buff, bamage boost from frame, passive reload etc.. Spec for minimal heat generation. Barrell: look for a little range. Then look to maximize "shoot longer" perks (heat gen) and buff reload if needed in other ways (armor mods etc.)
Source: https://youtu.be/Ljg_7aSDdUU
data.name: Legoleflash

data.description:
PVP Alt - emphasizes cooling efficiency for less reloads - Cooling MW + Range Mod
Barrel: Different versions / options available to reach the recommended 70 stability & 43 Range sweet spot.
Battery: Overclocked Heatsink is currently (2026-01-13) bugged with "laggy damage", but look for this perk also for easy perk swap once bug is fixed. In it's place now for battery, can focus on satbility or heat minimization. 
Column 1: Delicate Tuning the most important perk for this weapon. It is a top-tier PvP recommendation that functions as 'reverse closing time', providing significant range and accuracy growth at the start of an engagement to make four-tapping easier. 
Column 2: Precision Instrument for built-in forgiveness (3h2b). And also gives option for TTK shift if build into high weapon stats + surge mods + orb pickup.  
Source: https://youtu.be/Ljg_7aSDdUU
data.name: Legoleflash - Faster Cooling

data.description:
PVP Top - can fire longer, at cost of some reload slowness  - Stab MW + Range Mod
Barrel: Different versions / options available to reach the recommended 70 stability & 43 Range sweet spot.
Battery: Overclocked Heatsink is currently (2026-01-13) bugged with "laggy damage", but look for this perk also for easy perk swap once bug is fixed. In it's place now for battery, can focus on satbility or heat minimization. 
Column 1: Delicate Tuning the most important perk for this weapon. It is a top-tier PvP recommendation that functions as 'reverse closing time', providing significant range and accuracy growth at the start of an engagement to make four-tapping easier. 
Column 2: Precision Instrument for built-in forgiveness (3h2b). And also gives option for TTK shift if build into high weapon stats + surge mods + orb pickup.  
Source: https://youtu.be/Ljg_7aSDdUU
data.name: Legoleflash - Fire longer
